name: San Francisco Tycoon
description:
New map of the background in 2017 San Francisco Tycoon has released!

- The story of a city in San Francisco Bay.
- Rich stories through real estate transactions and crop transactions.
- San Francisco is the city that can make you rich.
- Cityscape spreading against Golden Gate Bridge.
- Get a diamond from Alcatraz Island.
- Let's trade crops when the plane arrives.
- When a plane arrives, you can trade real estate.

City management games, real estate games, San Francisco trips, San Francisco games, Golden Gate Bridge games, bridge construction games, bridge games, airport games, airplane games.
